name: Squares And Guns V: 1.2
description:
-Squares And Guns!-

The game where you can only shoot one bullet.

Play as a tiny little square. I know what you think, it sounds kind of stupid, BUT NO!

He is equipped with a FREAKING GUN.

Sounds crazy, right?

Well, if it does, this game is perfect for you!

Soundtrack: Squares And Guns Soundtrack | PogJuiceGaveMeEnergy (bandcamp.com)
